other_title: プライベートエモーション (Japanese)
plot: Professor Sayaka is a popular new girl on campus. She's well-liked and friendly to everyone. In fact, she's a little too friendly. In the Dean's mind, she's a shameless flirt and needs to be put in her place. And maybe he's right. During Sayaka's last teaching position she fell in love with Shin, one of her students, and the scandel forced her to move on to another college. Now Sayaka's being blackmailed into performing various sexy "services" and on top of everything else, she's fallen in love with another student.
